div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 272px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Select single multicluster mesh or mesh federation.

switch.text: Select single multicluster mesh or mesh federation.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 87px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 278px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
2. Do you want your combined clusters to expose all
the services to each other?

switch.text:
2. Do you want your combined clusters to expose all
 the services to each other?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 280px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
3.Are you required to control all the traffic that enters
your cluster

switch.text:
3.Are you required to control all the traffic that enters
your cluster

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 224px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
4. Will you be able to set common CA root
for the Citadels running in your clusters?

switch.text:
4. Will you be able to set common CA root
for the Citadels running in your clusters?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 272px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 1. Do you enforce uniform naming in your clusters?

switch.text: 1. Do you enforce uniform naming in your clusters?
